properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 24th October 2024** Our Warm Welcome space is in a large house, that we have as offices in Weymouth. The office can be busy, but there's a separate room available for you to come in and get warm, have a cuppa or even some soup to warm you on a cold day. We're open from Thursday 24 October and every other Thursday 2pm until 4pm, you're welcome.
